mapper.select: SELECT board_id AS boardId, title AS title, content AS content, insert_date AS insertDate FROM t_board WHERE title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ORDER BY boardId DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageCnt}
SELECT count(board_id) AS cnt FROM t_board WHERE title like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_board (title, content, insert_date) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, now())
mapper.select: SELECT board_id AS boardId, title AS title, content AS content, insert_date AS insertDate FROM t_board WHERE board_id = #{boardId}
SELECT reply_id AS replyId, board_id AS boardId, content AS content, insert_date AS insertDate FROM t_reply WHERE board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY replyId DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_reply (board_id, content, insert_date) VALUES (#{board_id}, #{content}, now())
